EmailTemplate.name: ES-2017-07-01-SoCal TUG Invite.Email-Invite
EmailTemplate.subject: 7/27 Southern California Turbonomic User Group
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}}, Come join us on Thursday, July 27th at WeWork Culver City for our Southern California Turbonomic User Group! All attendees will receive Turbonomic swag packs and will get to hear our experts discuss our new 5.9 release and all our enhanced hybrid-cloud capabilities. Make sure to RSVP by clicking on the link below to save your seat, as space is limited. RSVP Here <[[https://www.meetup.com/Turbonomic-SoCal-Meetup/events/240417971/]]> See you there! Murphy Vandervelde Marketing Program Manager Cell: 339-225-2502
